timeline.message: take license from skelcd package convert it to HTML

timeline.bodyText: Not sure I am understanding this. Do we want to avoid building the package on Uyuni?
timeline.author: juliogonzalez
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -27,6 +27,7 @@ Source0:        %{name}-%{version}.tar.gz
 BuildRoot:      %{_tmppath}/%{name}-%{version}-build
 BuildArch:      noarch
 Provides:       susemanager-branding = %{version}
+BuildRequires:  SUSE-Manager-Server-release

replies.bodyText:
This package contains the license files. For Uyuni we do not have license files. So we do not need this package.
Interestingly the ExcludeArch works with noarch packages.
replies.author: mcalmer

timeline.message: do not build for uyuni on openSUSE

timeline.bodyText: Looks good. I will see later if we can exclude submissions for this package.
timeline.author: juliogonzalez
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -26,6 +26,11 @@ Url:            https://github.com/uyuni-project/uyuni
 Source0:        %{name}-%{version}.tar.gz
 BuildRoot:      %{_tmppath}/%{name}-%{version}-build
 BuildArch:      noarch
+%if 0%{?is_opensuse}
+ExcludeArch:    i586 x86_64 ppc64le s390x aarch64
